title_ms: Pendapatan dan Perbelanjaan Isi Rumah: Negeri
description_en: This dataset tabulates household-level income, expenditure, poverty, and income inequality at state level. It is based on the Household Income & Expenditure Surveys (HIES) carried in 2022.
description_ms: Set data ini menunjukkan pendapatan, perbelanjaan, ketidaksamaan pendapatan, dan kadar kemiskinan bagi isi rumah di peringkat negeri. Data ini dihasilkan berdasarkan Survei Pendapatan dan Isi Rumah (HIES) yang dilaksanakan pada tahun 2022.
methodology_en: This data is is based on Household Income Surveys (HIS) and Household Income & Expenditure Surveys (HIES) carried out from 1970 to 2022, the latest of which is HIES 2022. The survey is carried out at least twice in a rolling five-year period to produce representative data regarding income, poverty and access to basic amenities for Malaysian households.
methodology_ms: Data ini dihasilkan berdasarkan Survei Pendapatan Isi Rumah (HIS) serta Survei Pendapatan dan Perbelanjaan Isi Rumah (HIES) yang dilaksanakan dari tahun 1970 sehingga survei terkini yang dilaksanakan pada tahun 2022. Survei itu dilaksanakan dua kali dalam tempoh lima tahun bagi tujuan menghasilkan data pendapatan, kemiskinan dan akses kepada kemudahan asas bagi isi rumah warganegara.
caveat_en: For a full account of the relative standard errors for the survey as well as the detailed survey methodology, please refer to the [HIES Technical Notes](https://storage.googleapis.com/dosm-public-publications/technote_hies_income_en.pdf).
caveat_ms: Untuk mendapat butiran penuh tentang ralat piawai survei serta metodologi yang terperinci, sila rujuk kepada [Nota Teknikal HIES](https://storage.googleapis.com/dosm-public-publications/technote_hies_income_bm.pdf).
publication_ms: [Laporan Survei Pendapatan dan Perbelanjaan Isi Rumah, 2022](https://storage.googleapis.com/dosm-public-publications/multiyear_2022_hies.pdf).

fields.name: date
fields.description_en: [Date] The date in YYYY-MM-DD format, with MM-DD set to 01-01 as this is annual data
fields.description_ms: [Tarikh] Tarikh dalam format YYYY-MM-DD, dengan MM-DD diberi nilai 01 kerana ini adalah data tahunan

fields.name: income_mean
fields.description_en: [Integer] Average (across households) gross monthly household income, in RM
fields.description_ms: [Integer] Purata (antara isi rumah) pendapatan kasar bulanan isi rumah, dalam RM

fields.name: income_median
fields.description_en: [Integer] Median (across households) gross monthly household income, in RM
fields.description_ms: [Integer] Penengah (antara isi rumah) pendapatan kasar bulanan isi rumah, dalam RM

fields.name: expenditure_mean
fields.description_en: [Integer] Average (across households) gross monthly household expenditure, in RM
fields.description_ms: [Integer] Purata (antara isi rumah) perbelanjaan kasar bulanan isi rumah, dalam RM

fields.name: gini
fields.description_en: [Float] Gini coefficient, with higher values indicating greater inequality of income between households
fields.description_ms: [Apung] Pekali gini, dengan nilai yang lebih tinggi melambangkan ketidaksaksamaan pendapatan yang lebih antara isi rumah

fields.name: poverty
fields.description_en: [Float] Proportion of households with monthly income below the Poverty Line Income (PLI)
fields.description_ms: [Apung] Nisbah isi rumah dengan pendapatan bulanan yang rendah daripada Pendapatan Garis Kemiskinan (PGK)
